Join Shyft to discover quality cleaning, painting, and service jobs that match your skills. Get matched with verified employers, complete quick AI interviews, and start earning faster.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description:
Worked on two complete MVPs over a three-month sprint, taking both from rough concepts to functional, testable products.

Delivered a full mobile app using Expo, implementing authentication, onboarding, habit logic, reminders, and smooth cross-platform UI. Built out the backend, handled data modelling, and shipped the entire flow end-to-end.

Contributed to a second MVP focused on digital networking and smart profile sharing. Implemented profile creation, visibility tiers, contextual sharing, swipe-style discovery, connection workflows, analytics, and subtle in-app interactions. Designed backend architecture, handled API development, and ensured the product behaved reliably on mobile.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description:
- Solely responsible for updating and maintaining the entire frontend of the product.
- Optimized database calls and promisified key methods, reducing account rendering time by 40-50%; integrated React Query for improved caching and faster load times.
- Revamped the entire UI, significantly enhancing user experience and interface consistency.
- Designed and developed four new pages, while collaborating closely with the CTO to manage the database and backend.
- Implemented Supabase authentication and role-based access policies, improving security and row-level security (RLS).

projects.description: ViewUs is a powerful platform that helps businesses seamlessly collect, manage, and showcase customer testimonials. With ViewUs, you can create beautiful testimonial walls, collect video and text testimonials, and import reviews from popular social platforms - all without complex setup or developer assistance

projects.name: clan-chat
projects.description:
Clan Chat is a web application which group interaction via chats, audio and video calls.
Created a multiple servers architecture using next js for managing main application handling servers, channels and members along with user authentication using PostgreSQL for handling this data.
Created a seperate web socket server for handling chats using Redis or pub/sub architecture and MongoDB for persistent storage.

experience.title: Co-Founder & Chief Operating Officer (COO)
experience.description:
We make creating content stress-free. Timely turnarounds. Frictionless collaboration. Quality you can bet on. 

Creating content customers love is hard. For most brands, scaling content is a nightmare. Agencies and production companies are slow and expensive. Freelance marketplaces put the burden on you with endless notes and revisions. Between hiring editors, writers, videographers, producers, photographers, motion designers, and SEO experts‚Ä¶building an internal team just isn‚Äôt feasible for most organizations.

Contact helps brands increase their content production without increasing their headcount. With content plans that can easily scale up or down with your business needs, Contact makes it easy for  teams to supercharge their marketing.

Schedule a 30-minute free demo with me here: https://calendly.com/contactrob 
(Zero pressure, and if you need to reschedule, go right ahead.)

www.contactstudios.com

experience.title: Senior Writer
experience.description: At Herb, Rob wore a wide variety of hats, exceeding his responsibilities as a Senior Writer to help the publication expand into video content, target SEO keywords to boost organic views, and generally increase the quality of Herb's content. Rob's responsibilities included writing investigative reports, SEO content writing, general content writing, guide-writing, script writing, video production, documentary production, editing, social-media writing and strategic planning, camera operating, and more. Rob played a significant role in Herb's SEO content migration process, in which he helped write new SEO-driven content while re-structuring old content to boost organic traffic and get Herb to the top of SERP results. He helped produce, film, and script a number of successful series that have accumulated millions of views and generated hundreds of thousands of dollars in revenue. Rob also filmed and produced Herb's feature documentary about the opioid crisis in Canada.

basic_info.headline: Entrepreneur and investor building businesses online | Featured on Forbes, Kajabi + Semrush | Helped 3,000+ people build their personal brand.
basic_info.about:
Everyone wants to build a personal brand, and I figured out how.

With over 20M+ impressions, 300,000 followers across socials, and multiple 6 figures made, I can show you how you can build one too (without spending years figuring out how)

In 2022: I was unemployed and trying to get into a master's degree - downloaded LinkedIn
In 2023: I became #1 female creator on LinkedIn by building my personal brand and agency
In 2024: I'm building the best education platform to teach people exactly how to do it

Helped, coached and worked with 500+ build contents systems, increase engagement, improve their writing and beyond using proven strategies that worked for me. 

Here's how I can help you:

1. Subscribe to my YouTube (It's free, and better than people's paid courses!)
2. Join 15,100+ amazing people and subscribe to my newsletter. 
3. Join 500+ members inside Literallyacademy.com

And if you're not ready for either! Welcome to my profile anyway, I talk about writing, storytelling,  personal branding and tell a lot of stories.

See you on the feed üíñ

Sponsorships + booking : mary@ladigitalmx.com

Changing the education system one step at a time. 

An academy for entrepreneurs and CEO's giving you every blueprint necessary to build, scale and grow your business through content on LinkedIn (and beyond).

- Full a-z curriculim with netflix quality videos 
- Monthly Live calls to answer any questions

Including Masterclasses by the 0.01% of creators and entrepreneurs.

It's time to build your brand.
